timeline.body: We should align the error messages with the existing ones (e.g. `Expected ... but ... [context: ...]`.

timeline.body:
I think input mappings on a start event doesn't make sense. A start event is activated on workflow instance creation or when it is triggered by an event. So, I see no use case of an input mapping - only for output mappings. 
Let's remove it if you agree.

timeline.message:
chore(engine): refactoring start event onEvent processing

This is a combination of 4 commits.

chore(engine): migrate the full lifecycle of start event

chore(engine): clean up old start event event occurred handler

chore(engine): remove todo

we cannot use this.eventRecord there.
